data.eml:eml: The North American spider genera Paratheridula, Tekellina, Pholcomma and Archerius (Araneae: Theridiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Levi, Herbert W. (1957): The North American spider genera Paratheridula, Tekellina, Pholcomma and Archerius (Araneae: Theridiidae). Transactions of the American Microscopical Society 76 (2): 105-115, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publications/Levi1957d/Levi1957d.pdf
